alert.note: Alert for Codington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 22 at 8:10AM MDT until April 27 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River at Watertown Sioux Conifer Road affecting Codington County. Big Sioux River at Watertown Broadway Avenue affecting Codington County. Big Sioux River Near Castlewood affecting Hamlin County. .For sites with a river forecast, the forecast includes precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any future precipitation could affect the forecasts. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sioux River at Watertown Sioux Conifer Road. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Significant amounts of pasture land are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 9.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM CDT Saturday was 9.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday evening and continue falling to 8.9 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Sunday by 515 PM CDT.
